name: Popovers / Yorkshire Pudding
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth
Periodically throughout the day, blitz the blender to add air to the batter
When ready to cook, preheat the oven to 450˚F
During the preheating, add oil and butter to coat the bottom of each muffin cup in the muffin tin
Put muffin tin with oil and butter in oven to heat up until sizzling, it is critical that the oil is hot before the batter goes in
Pour batter into muffin tin, filling each cup ~half full
Bake for 15 minutes then reduce to 350˚F for 8-10 minutes
